item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，三菱化学寻求出售医药部门
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周一报道，日本化工生产商三菱化学集团公司正在寻求出售其制药部门三菱田边制药公司。【原文：Japanese chemical producer Mitsubishi Chemical Group Corp. is looking to sell its pharmaceutical unit, Mitsubishi Tanabe Pharma Corp., Nikkei reported on Monday.】

item.title: 超强台风 "八木 "造成中国和越南至少 30 人死亡
item.description: 超强台风 "八木 "在中国南部和越南北部造成的破坏包括至少 30 人死亡，农业和渔业受到严重影响，能源基础设施也受到一些破坏。【原文：Super Typhoon Yagi’s trail of devastation across southern China and northern Vietnam included at least 30 deaths, a major impact on agriculture and fishing, as well as some damage to energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 包凡退出后，华兴资本复牌大跌
item.description: 华兴资本控股有限公司（China Renaissance Holdings Ltd.）的股票在香港恢复交易后下跌了 72%，这距离该公司前董事长包凡被拘留后股票停牌约 17 个月。【原文：China Renaissance Holdings Ltd.’s shares slid 72% after resuming trading in Hong Kong, about 17 months after its stock was suspended following the detention of its former Chairman Bao Fan.】

item.title: Clearlake 支持的车轮制造商申请破产保护
item.description: Wheel Pros 是一家售后市场专业汽车零部件制造商，在与通胀成本和需求下滑作斗争后申请了破产保护。【原文：Wheel Pros, a maker of after-market specialty auto parts, filed for bankruptcy protection after struggling with inflation costs and a slump in demand.】

item.title: OCI 公司以 20 亿美元的交易价格将甲醇业务出售给 Methanex 公司
item.description: OCI NV 公司同意将其甲醇业务出售给 Methanex 公司，交易价值超过 20 亿美元，这是这家荷兰化学品公司为提高自身价值而出售资产的最新举措。【原文：OCI NV agreed to sell its methanol business to Methanex Corp. in a deal worth more than $2 billion, the latest move by the Dutch chemicals company to offload assets to boost its value.】

item.title: GIC 支持的 Nium 推迟 IPO 计划，重新专注于增长
item.description: 新加坡支付公司 Nium Pte 将其在美国首次公开募股的计划推迟一年多，专注于加强团队建设和增加收入。【原文：Singapore payments company Nium Pte is pushing back its plans for an initial public offering in the US by more than a year, focusing on shoring up its team and growing revenue.】

item.title: 美的开始接受高达 35 亿美元香港首次公开募股的投资者订单
item.description: 美的集团股份有限公司已开始接受投资者订单，准备在香港出售高达 35 亿美元的股票，这将是两年来中国公司最大的一次上市。【原文：Midea Group Co. has started taking investor orders for an up to $3.5 billion share sale in Hong Kong, in what is set to be the biggest listing by a Chinese company in two years.】

item.title: 马来西亚小型连锁超市 99 Speed Mart 首次亮相即大涨 14
item.description: 在马来西亚七年来最大的首次公开募股之后，连锁便利店 99 Speed Mart Retail Holdings Bhd 的股票在上市首日大涨超过 14%。【原文：Shares of convenience-store chain 99 Speed Mart Retail Holdings Bhd rallied more than 14% on their first day of trading after what was Malaysia’s biggest initial public offering in seven years.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 Sakana AI 公司希望在日本建立战略合作伙伴关系
item.description: Sakana AI 认为，随着中美紧张局势的加剧，日本有可能迎来更多的战略投资者，从而推动本国人工智能生态系统的发展。【原文：Sakana AI sees potential for more strategic investors in Japan as rising US-China tensions spur the country to boost its own AI ecosystem.】

item.title: 中国经济痛苦抵消美联储提振作用，人民币反弹面临考验
item.description: 一些分析师认为，由于中国的经济困境可能会在美联储降息后阻碍美元回流，人民币近期的反弹空间有限。【原文：The yuan’s recent rally has limited room to extend as China’s economic woes may discourage the repatriation of dollar holdings following the Federal Reserve’s rate cut, according to some analysts.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: Couche-Tard 不会放弃 7-Eleven。日本企业对中国反感亚洲股市将下跌。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：Couche-Tard won’t give up on 7-Eleven. Japanese businesses are souring on China. Asia stocks set to drop. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 中国的液化天然气进口量可能会因岩洞被填满而受到影响
item.description: 在提前开始为冬季需求高峰做准备之后，中国加强了天然气的地下储存。【原文：China has boosted underground storage of natural gas, after it made an early start on preparations for peak demand over the winter.】

item.title: 铁矿石自 2022 年 11 月以来首次跌破 90 美元
item.description: 铁矿石自 2022 年 11 月以来首次跌破每吨 90 美元，由于最大买家中国的需求下滑，这种炼钢材料仍然面临压力。【原文：Iron ore fell below $90 a ton for the first time since November 2022, with the steelmaking material remaining under pressure as demand slumps in biggest buyer China.】

item.title: 亚洲将在非农数据公布后迎来看跌一天，日元可能上涨：分析师
item.description: 分析师称，由于周五美国非农就业报告弱于预期，此前对经济软着陆的乐观情绪被打消，亚洲股市可能会承压。【原文：Asian stocks are likely to come under pressure as the weaker than expected US payrolls report on Friday quashes earlier optimism over an economic soft landing, analysts say.】

item.title: 石油在经历残酷一周后反弹，交易商审时度势
item.description: 本周的焦点是三份可能澄清需求前景的报告。【原文：Oil rose from its lowest close since 2021 after a deep weekly loss pushed futures close to levels regarded as oversold, with the focus this week on three reports that may clarify the demand outlook.】

item.title: GP 持股公司 Armen 收购信贷基金 Chorus Capital 的股份
item.description: Armen 是一家专注于收购私募股权公司股权的欧洲投资公司，它将收购 Chorus Capital 16% 的股份，这是它在另类信贷领域的首次投资。【原文：Armen, a European investment firm focused on buying stakes in private equity houses, is buying 16% of Chorus Capital in its first investment in the alternative credit space.】

item.title: Klarna Backer Atomico 融资 12.4 亿美元，以促进欧洲初创企业的发展
item.description: 曾为金融科技宠儿 Stripe 公司和 Klarna Bank AB 提供支持的伦敦风险投资公司 Atomico 已为两只新基金募集了 12.4 亿美元。【原文：Atomico, a London-based venture firm that has backed fintech darlings Stripe Inc. and Klarna Bank AB, has raised $1.24 billion for two new funds.】

item.title: 新对冲基金押注日本市场复兴获支持
item.description: 总部位于香港的森谷资本有限公司（Sengu Capital Ltd.）正在利用日本金融市场复苏的契机，成立一家新的对冲基金，专注于改善日本的企业管理。【原文：Hong Kong-based Sengu Capital Ltd. is starting a new hedge fund focused on improving corporate management in Japan, tapping into the country’s financial market revival.】

item.title: 日元走强、美国就业数据疲软，日本股市将下跌
item.description: 在令人失望的美国就业数据加剧了人们对世界最大经济体健康状况的担忧之后，日元升值对出口商的盈利前景构成了压力，日本股票期货下跌。【原文：Japanese stock futures fell as the yen’s advance weighed on the earnings outlook for exporters after disappointing US jobs data fueled concern about the health of the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第二大养老金公司增持新西兰电力公司股份：报道
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）报道，管理着超过 3000 亿澳元（约合 2030 亿美元）资金的澳大利亚第二大养老基金--澳大利亚退休信托基金（Australian Retirement Trust）增持了新西兰能源分销商 Powerco Ltd. 的股份，成为该公司的最大股东。【原文：Australian Retirement Trust, the nation’s second-largest pension fund with more than A$300 billion ($203 billion) under management, has increased its stake in New Zealand’s energy distributor Powerco Ltd. to become the largest shareholder, according to a report in the Australian Financial Review.】

item.title: 就业数据和美联储讲话后亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 美国就业数据好坏参半，而美联储不置可否，这加剧了人们对央行可能已经等了太久才降息的担忧，亚洲股市将因此下跌。【原文：Asian stocks are set to drop after mixed US jobs data and a noncommittal Federal Reserve added to concerns the central bank may have waited too long to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 特拉维斯-斯科特、萨布丽娜-卡朋特和音乐排行榜的黑暗艺术
item.description:
斯科特说他被夺走了一张冠军专辑。卡朋特夺得了桂冠。【原文：

Scott says he was robbed of a No. 1 album. Carpenter claimed the crown.

】

item.title: 舒默警告政府将在 9 月 30 日截止日期前关门
item.description: 参议院多数党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）强调了避免政府在 9 月 30 日关门的重要性，因为议员们将在 8 月休会后返回华盛顿，而美国大选将在 11 月举行。【原文：Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer emphasized the importance of avoiding a government shutdown on Sept. 30, as lawmakers return to Washington after the August break with the US election ahead in November.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉的镇压运动让马杜罗短期内如愿以偿
item.description: 尼古拉斯-马杜罗如愿以偿。暂时如此。【原文：Nicolás Maduro has gotten what he wants. For now.】

item.title: 苹果如何统治世界
item.description: 这家世界上最有价值的公司因其对 iPhone 的狂热控制而令人又爱又怕。这种情况还能持续多久？【原文：The world’s most valuable company is loved, and feared, because of the fanatical control it maintains over the iPhone. How long can that last?】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 对冲基金正在削减对石油反弹的押注。随着中国钢材价格的下跌，铁矿石呈下降趋势。在巴西，生物燃料比石油更受青睐。【原文：Hedge funds are slashing bets on an oil rally amid a rout. Iron ore is on a downward trend as declines for steel prices in China bite. And biofuels are getting a boost over oil in Brazil.】

item.title: Zelis 所有者正在商谈以 170 亿美元的价值出售股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）和帕特农资本（Parthenon Capital）正在洽谈出售 Zelis 少数股权的交易，该交易可能使这家医疗保健技术公司的估值达到约 170 亿美元。【原文：Bain Capital and Parthenon Capital are in talks to sell a minority stake in Zelis in a transaction that could value the health-care technology company at about $17 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 首席财务官如何博弈激烈的美国大选
item.description:
此外，SAP 的 Dominik Asam 还将介绍重组管理等内容。【原文：

Plus, SAP’s Dominik Asam on managing a restructuring and more.

】

item.title: 债券市场的反弹取决于美联储降息的速度
item.description: 曾努力预测美联储将把利率提高到多高水平的债券交易员们发现，利率下降的过程也同样令人烦恼。【原文：Bond traders who struggled to predict how high the Federal Reserve would raise interest rates are finding the way down just as vexing.】

item.title: Couche-Tard 将确认七枚印章；被拒绝后对其感兴趣
item.description: 知情人士称，Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.计划告诉 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. plans to tell Seven & i Holdings Co. that it’s still keen to pursue an acquisition, even after the Japanese convenience store operator rejected its initial proposal, people with knowledge of the matter said.】
